name: shark_wang Projects
body:
### Welcome to Shark Wang github page

I lived in Chengdu, a beautiful city in middle of China. Since 1984 in junior school, I used BASIC on an Apple II. Now, I and some colleges said goodbye to ORACLE and IBM. We want turn back to the beginning, get the pure happiness from software writing.
 
### Projects

Now, I am working on 2 projects. 

First, the **Borgnix**, an IOT design platform for beginners. It could help you to connect, manage and monitor the smart things, and finally, create something. The beta site had online in [https://dev.borgnix.com](https://dev.borgnix.com).

The second, the **Voyager**, this is a fast data design tools set. You can trace any log, parse it and create awesome algorithm to get interesting analyze result. This project will open source later.

### Authors and Contributors
Borgnix and Voyager: @stevensu1977 @sharkwang @xiedidan @inoc603
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
